name: Black Flag: Islas Pirata
description:
You are Captain Ivy. One day awoken to find the Castellan islands overrun with Pirates and Skeletons. You alone must be the one to ride the island of these horrors.

Ivy has two basic attacks and three Special Moves. Left and Right click operate medium and strong attacks respectively. Certain combos of these abilities will let you activate your special moves.

When you've cleared an island you must find your way to your ship and press 'R' to board. R near an island will let you dock at that island if need be. There are three Islands which need your help.
